name: german-credit

predict_prompt.bad: You will not get the loan

why_ans.bad: The below graph shows important features for this prediction. The red features weaken your chance to get the loan, while the blue features strengthen it.
why_ans.good: The below graph shows important features for this prediction. The red features strengthen your chance to get the loan, while the blue features weaken it.

feature_ans: The model used all features, however, may have a significant impact on the model's prediction for your loan application.
dataset_description: Pretend you are an applicant applying for credit, the model will predict whether you are likely to default on your loan, based on your personal and financial information.

feature_description.Age: The age of the applicant in years
feature_description.Job: The type of job the applicant has
feature_description.Housing: The type of housing the applicant lives in
feature_description.Saving accounts: The amount of money the applicant has saved in a savings account
feature_description.Checking account: The amount of money the applicant has in a checking account
feature_description.Credit amount: The amount of credit in Euro the applicant is requesting.
feature_description.Duration: The duration of the credit in months.
